queries.description: Declaring an array with external linkage without its size being explicitly specified can disallow consistency and range checks on the array size and usage.
queries.name: Arrays with external linkage declared without explicit size shall not be used

RULE-6-0-2.title: When an array with external linkage is declared, its size should be explicitly specified

queries.description: Using objects or functions with external linkage in implementation files makes code harder to understand.
queries.name: Objects or functions with external linkage shall be declared in a header file

RULE-6-5-1.title: A function or object with external linkage should be introduced in a header file
